alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 8:58PM MST until August 20 at 9:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 857 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Peoria, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Youngtown, New River, Sun City West, Sun City, Cave Creek, Carefree and Piestewa Peak Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 203 and 241. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 3 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 135 and 159. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
